answer: That's not what I was going to say.

question: What were you going to say...? ...the Last Third in Geneva... ...fourteen, fifteen, sixteen. It's good. It's very good. The charge takes the car out... We got the flashbangs fore and aft, You hit the driver, follow down the driver's side, the car ain't going nowhere, the muscle gets out, I cap em, I go with the girl. You exfil on your own, we're on to the airport. At the airport. When we hit the Conex. When you Seal Us In...you walk away. I cannot have heat on it. Now ...it's an appleseed. ...yeah, I'm just a Man of Peace...
Stay by me.
answer: ...they said they were going to take care of me...

question: I'm going to take care of you. You hold on, now.
...you remember, Baby, we went to high school together... You dropped your earring. You're Picasso, right...? That's who you are...
answer: ...they're going to send me to a Party.

question: No, Baby, you're going Home. You're just taking the long way home. ...I told you to stay on the bed. ...you're going travelling.
...we're going to take a little trip. ...put that away.
Y'can't smoke it. American tobacco. Smell. Carry. In the desert air. Put that on. Over your head.
Whole world likes Blondes. That's why you're here. Put the bandana on.
answer: I need a smoke. ...gimme the fucken smoke. I could make you give me the smoke.

question: Keep it together. Keep it together, or I'm gonna give you a shot and carry you out.
...that's right...
answer: ...I'm just a whore...They wouldn't even come get me...

question: They sent me...
...that's right.
One riot, one Ranger, you ever hear that?
answer: Leonides, the King of Sparta, when a neighboring state would beg for Military Aid. Would send One Man.

question: ...well, there you go.
No. I think we went to different schools. ...put the bandana on.
answer: Did you hear the one about the king who turned his daughter into Gold?

question: Yeah - I heard that one.
I didn't ask you.
answer: I don't know where we are...

question: You just keep it together. You put this on.
You... A little walk-in-the-park. See there...?
answer: No, you know what my mistake was...?

question: ...what was that...? ...what was your mistake...?
answer: ...you think we bring our troubles on ourselves...?

question: I'm certain of it. No, no...come on baby...come on, come on girl Shussh, baby... shussh... shussh... it's going to be alright... This's going to make Everything Allright...
That's right, Laura...Walk away from him. Walk to the Plane...He can't hurt you now. Walk to the plane...
DON'T SHOOT, DON'T SHOOT, DON'T Cuff 'im... Yes...well...
...wait till she lifts off, take him outside and shoot him.
Because she's dead. You had to know the Secret Knowledge. Didn't you?
